name: interlayer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a layer that exists or is placed between other layers: The glass has an interlayer of plastic or resin sandwiched between two panes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe material is not normally used on its own but as a facing or interlayer in composite materials.The target consisted of a series of thin layers of condensed matter separated by interlayers of low-density matter.

existing or placed between layers of a material: The heating drives off any interlayer water. The semiconductor device includes an interlayer insulation film.
More examplesFewer examplesWe produce and supply interlayer films for cars.an inter-layer contact structure in a semiconductor device.
